name: saviors_of_kamigawa_max
description: HUGE package capturing Saviors of Kamigawa themes: Epic, Channel, Sweep, Arcane/Splice, Spiritcraft, Soulshift, Wisdom (hand size matters), plus Kamigawa-flavored subtypes and keywords.
credits: Generated by ChatGPT for the user's MtG set generator.

Instant: Arcane — Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn.
Arcane — Tap up to {X} target creatures.
Arcane — This spell deals {X} damage to any target.
Arcane — Target player mills {X} cards.
Arcane — Return target nonland permanent with mana value {X} or less to its owner's hand.
Arcane — Create {X} 1/1 [TOKEN_COLOR] Spirit creature tokens.
Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
Draw a card for each Spirit you control.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
Exile target card from a graveyard. If you have seven or more cards in hand, draw a card.
Sweep — Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.
Sweep — Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Create that many 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens.
Splice onto Arcane {X}. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay {X}. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)
Splice onto Arcane {X}{X}.
Sorcery: Arcane — Search your library for a Spirit card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Arcane — Each opponent discards a card. If you have more cards in hand than an opponent, draw a card.
Arcane — Return target Spirit or Arcane card from your graveyard to your hand.

Epic — Create a 4/4 white Spirit creature token with flying. (For the rest of the game, at the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You can't cast spells for the rest of the game.)
Reveal the top {X} cards of your library. Put a Spirit or Arcane card from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Target player draws {X} cards. You get a boon if you have seven or more cards in hand.
Sweep — Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.
Sweep — Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Create that many 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens.
Enchantment: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have seven or more cards in hand, draw a card.
Arcane spells you cast cost {X} less to cast.
Spirits you control get +{X}/+{X}.
Whenever you cast an Arcane spell, you may exile target card from a graveyard. If you do, scry 1.
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.
Artifact: Equipment — Equipped creature gets +{X}/+{X} and has bushido 1. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Whenever you cast an Arcane spell, untap target creature.
Spells with 'Splice onto Arcane' you cast cost {X} less to cast.
Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return target Arcane card from your graveyard to your hand.
Creature: Spirit — Soulshift {X}. (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value {X} or less from your graveyard to your hand.)
Spirit — Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you gain 1 life..
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
CARDNAME gets +{X}/+{X} as long as you have at least {X} cards in hand.
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you have seven or more cards in hand, draw a card.
Whenever you cast an Arcane spell, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Other Spirits you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, scry 1.
Bushido 1 (Whenever this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Ninjutsu {X} (Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Channel — {COST}: Discard CARDNAME: Create a tapped 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.
Channel — {COST}: Discard CARDNAME: Prevent the next {X} damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Land: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {X}.
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may add {X}.
